subsection_content:
Acute or chronic prostatitis can cause many complications (2) related to the patient's physical and mental health such as:
Septicemia; Epididymitis; Prostate abscess; The infection spreads to nearby areas such as the pelvis and spine; Sexual dysfunction, typically erectile dysfunction; Changes in sperm and semen can cause infertility; Anxiety, depression; Death, in severe cases
When suffering from prostatitis, the patient may or may not have symptoms. However, if you notice the following symptoms, you should immediately go to medical authorities:
Bleeding, especially after sex; Abnormal ejaculation, ejaculation mixed with blood; Severe pain appears in the pelvis and lower back
subsection_title: viem tuyen tien liet.json. Complications of prostatitis in men
